pullrequest.title: region events plugin w/ integration tests

content.raw:
Can you pull from osrf/gazebo and merge with the `mentor2_v2` branch there? There is some divergence between the branches.

~~~
hg pull #!/osrf/gazebo
hg up mentor2_v2
hg merge
hg commit -m "merge"
# etc.
~~~

Let me know if you need any help with this.
content.html:
Can you pull from osrf/gazebo and merge with the mentor2_v2 branch there? There is some divergence between the branches.

hg pull #!/osrf/gazebo
hg up mentor2_v2
hg merge
hg commit -m "merge"
# etc.

Let me know if you need any help with this.
